name: 10 Blocks
description:
All you need is a touchpad or mouse. Rest of controls found in game:

Your task is to collect all 10 yellow blocks while avoiding the white/grey obstacles that will be in your path. Beware of any moving blocks as they can be unpredictable 
and dangerous. Remember if you come across any green blocks
you are safe to travel through them. The rest of the instructions are 
provided in game when they are necessary for a levels completion.

Thanks for playing!!                              

Please leave feedback :)
